name: fyrsmithlabs
description: Claude Code plugins for fyrsmithlabs project standards, workflows, development practices, and design system compliance

plugins.name: fyrsmithlabs
plugins.description: Claude Code plugins for fyrsmithlabs project standards, workflows, development practices, and contextd cross-session memory. Includes YAGNI/KISS enforcement, git-repo-standards, git-workflows with multi-agent consensus review, and contextd integration for semantic search, memory, checkpoints, and error remediation.

plugins.name: terminal-elegance
plugins.description: Terminal Elegance design system compliance checking for FyrsmithLabs products. Audits CSS, templates, and documentation for hardcoded values, accessibility issues, and brand consistency.
